Title: Relates to carbon dioxide allowances for biomass-fired electric generating facilities under the carbon dioxide budget trading program
Summary: Establishes that electric generating facilities that use biomass for more than 50% of its annual heat input shall not be required to obtain carbon dioxide allowances for carbon dioxide emissions attributable to the burning of biomass under the carbon dioxide budget trading program.
